original_text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.
korean_text: 장차 형제가 형제를, 아버지가 자식을 죽는 데에 내주며 자식들이 부모를 대적하여 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death
and the children shall rise up against their parents
and cause them to be put to death
